
### stack canaries pro/con  {.smaller}


* pro: no change to calling convention
* pro: recompile only --- no extra work
* con: can't protect existing executable/library files (without recompile)
* con: [doesn't protect against many ways of exploiting buffer overflows]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only}
* con: [vulnerable to information leaks]{.fragment fragment-index=3 .custom .myem-only}
